description: An updated roasted potato salad with extra veggies, creamy feta and lots of herbs.
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Warm Feta, Pea & Herb Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and place the courgettes, leeks, and feta in a baking tray. Drizzle over half the olive oil and top with lemon zest.
Place the potatoes in a roasting tin and pour over the remaining olive oil and season to taste.
Add both trays to the oven and roast for 20 minutes, then remove both. Toss the potatoes and return to the oven for a further 20 minutes.
Add the peas to the feta and vegetable tray and roast for another 10 minutes, remove from the oven and set aside.
Once the potatoes are golden and roasted, add them to the vegetable tray and toss them to coat in baked feta.
Sprinkle over chopped mint, coriander, cracked black pepper and a squeeze of lemon juice, mix and serve warm.
